features: Screen Cleaner is Your Screen’s New Bestfriend! - EVEO is proud to present a screen cleaner that’s perfectly suited for your TV. Meet your new screen cleaner, computer screen cleaner, laptop cleaner, iPad cleaner, Macbook,tv cleaner or any other electronic device. Our screen cleaner spray and wipe along with the included plush microfiber cloth, easily removes dust, fingerprints & other smudges on the screen’s surface. Clean effectively for a streak-free screen

Gentle on your Screens- Our screen cleaner spray and wipes is compatible to be used even for the most sensitive LCD, LED, CRT, and OLED screens in proper use. Be at ease knowing that this product is compatible with all the major brands: LG, SONY, Samsung, Sharp, iPad, iPhone, Android screens, Kindle, PC monitors - we’ve got you covered! Can be used as LCD screen cleaner, tv cleaner, smart tv screen cleaner, and more

Premium Super Soft Plush Microfiber Cloth - Included in this efficient screen cleaning kit. This screen cleaner spray and wipe has our signature plush microfiber cloth specially designed to comply with screens and monitors and leave them streak-free. Has been shown to effectively absorbs stubborn stains, zero streaks, and no fiber shedding. Always use this together with our screen cleaner for the best results

Easy-to-Use Screen Cleaner Kit + microfiber cleaning cloth- The EVEO Screen Cleaning Kit will easily be your new favorite tool when it comes to taking care of the things you love most, quick and easy solution for a streak-free screen. Simply screw on the sprayer gun on the screen cleaner bottle. Spray the cleaning liquid onto the microfiber cloth, then wipe the screen until desired cleanliness & shine is achieved.

Quality Screen Care Kit Worth Purchasing - Enjoy a convenient Screen Cleaner anytime, anywhere you need it. Your satisfaction is our top priority. We stand behind the quality of our products and that’s why, you shouldn’t be worrying at all. We manufacture the Best Screen Cleaner. and can be used for laptop cleaning kit, laptop screen cleaner, tv screen cleaner for smart tv. MacBook screen cleaner, monitor cleaner or screen cleaner spray for electronic devices with microfiber cleaning cloth

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.6 4.6 out of 5 stars 27,366 ratings 4.6 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My computer screen has never been so clean. I’ve only used it once but so far have had no issues or streaks. No damage or anything to my screen. I’ll have to turn down my display brightness because it is so clean. I love the little microfiber towel is included which makes it very convenient to use!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I'm in love, this stuff cleans EVERYTHING you look at or through
reviews.reviewText: I hate smudges, finger prints and dust so I tend to clean my TV screens religiously. I've been using window cleaner up until now but I just bought a $2800 OLED TV and a $1000 OLED monitor. So I wanted something besides window cleaner, which you're not supposed to use on TVs but I never cared about it until I dropped a lot of money on these two items.This cleaner turns out to be the best cleaner for EVERYTHING. TVs, monitors, smart phone screens, your smart watch and even glasses. Plus it's easy. Spray it on a microfiber cloth instead of the screen, then wipe the screen. I don't spray a lot on the cloth as it's extremely effective and evaporates almost instantly unless too much is used. If I have sprayed too much I just wipe the screen with the dry side of my cloth. The results I get every time are a smudge free sparkling screen with zero streaks or spots.It's a godsend for glasses. I wear glasses and 100% hate smudges. I keep a bottle of eyeglass cleaner (like the kind you get at the eye doctor) and a microfiber cleaning cloth around me at all times and I end up cleaning my glasses at least 20 times a day whenever I notice they are no longer crystal clear.Well, I've emptied all of those bottles and filled them up with this cleaner. It easily cleans my glasses and makes them crystal clear. The kind of clean I get after cleaning them twice with the regular stuff I used to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I use this to clean my cell phones, iPads and flat screen tv. Works as advertised. I tried cleaning my tv with just water and a cloth but it was worse after I was done. This cleaner and cloth did an awesome job. No streaks. A bit pricey but I guess you get what you pay for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pricey But Works
reviews.reviewText: Out of the box (no puns or whatever) LOWER THE PRICE.The product works.The bottle shoots a MIST (and stream,) so you do not waste the bottle fast. Just make it affordable.I have used it on TV, PC and phone screens. I bought it for my glasses. Works great. Others sell TWO 16-oz bottles."Why complain to us?" Is the common Capitalist argument. Capitalist retort, "I just have." I will see if a competitor can give 2 bottles for one of theirs AND not sacrifice quality.Nice bottle and effective product for $20? I soon return to Water & Vinegar.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and effective
reviews.reviewText: cleaned my monitor perfectly in one pass. definitely recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Cleaned off all finger prints and dust immediately and stayed clean. Didn’t give me any issues at all. 10/10 recommend !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great, worth the money
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to use for my laptop and phone, but ended up using this on all my screens and lens. I use this on my security cameras to clean the lens and it works like magic. It seems like it coats it in something that protects it. I only have to clean the cameras once a month now with this. Laptop screen looks like new when I use it on it. TV screens come out like crystal clear. Before it was multiple different screen cleaners but now it is one for all. The cloth is comes with is super soft. I use that on the delicate screens like the camera's lens.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Top notch product. Highly recommend. No streaks or residue left behind. Spray on included cloth not screen clean with long wipes. Dries instantly. Magic!! I used it on my Dell 34 inch Curved PC Monitor.

reviews.reviewTitle: Worked great for me and I'm a smoker
reviews.reviewText: So as an avid gamer and a smoker, who has not cleaned the monitor in over 2 years... :)) worked great for me, yes it took like 5 to 10 times to clean all the crap off and NO scratches with the micro fibre cloth included, I have 3 monitors so it wasnt just a one time deal. I built an exhaust fan for my smoke, portable AC duct and computer fan, so it's not like I sit in clouds of smoke, as most of it goes out the duct, the window is always open too cause the 7990 vid card is a mini furnace... anyway, so many years of cleaning left in bottle and it worked great for me.

Muy buen producto para limpiar celulares, pantallas, computadoras, etc. si bien el precio es un poco alto creo que vale la pena.Incluye su toalla de microfibra, se nota de buena calidad y el color me encantó.

reviews.reviewTitle: Yes, it did meet my interest

reviews.reviewText: Product works pretty good and it does not leave any streaks. Keeps my tv and pc nice and clean

Siempre he lidiado con huellas de grasa en la pantalla de mi MacBook. Pero desde que descubrí este producto, eliminar esas manchas se ha vuelto mucho más sencillo. Lo mejor de todo es que no deja marcas residuales. ¡Un plus! El paño incluido es la cereza del pastel; definitivamente, hace la diferencia. Lo recomiendo ampliamente.
